name: Don Muchacho: Vigilante
description:
In a world where virtually all crime has been eradicated, the devil only has one remaining stronghold on Earth. One person has taken on the responsibility of guiding these poor souls through this establishment’s hellish landscape: DON MUCHACHO: VIGILANTE. Welcome to the DMV.

Become Don Muchacho as he helps Granny Vanessa get a vanity plate for her grandson. Use the mouse to aim and project energy, propelling Granny closer and closer to achieving her motor vehicle needs.

Don Muchacho: Vigilante was designed and built by Tom Aleo, Marshall Hattersley, Patrick O’Doherty, Chris Muhrer, and Javi Muhrer as part of Ludum Dare 49. Feel free to reach out with any merchandising opportunities. Don Muchacho already has representation, but Granny Vanessa could use some help.

CREDITS: 
Chris - Programming, Level Design
Javi - Programming, Level Design
Marshall - Programming, Level Design, Music
Patrick - Programming, Level Design
Tom - Art, Level Design
